Class GameController

  • Object
    • controllers.GameController

  • public class GameController
extends Object
    Controller for Game loop and phases
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Warren

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean assignedCard
      This boolean is false if a card hasn't been assigned to the current player.
      static boolean isTournament
      This boolean is false for normal gameplay and true for tournament mode.
